document_data.mainbody: zan Stonesplitter was the owner and proprietor of Ironhands Arms, a weapon shop in Highcastle, in the late 1400s DR. His store offered quality weapons at fair prices for the local Dalesmen and travelers who often passed through on the road between Cormyr and Sembia. Azan was also a capable blacksmith and could forge excellent weapons for patrons so requested.
